mapper.select: SELECT EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.ROOM_CD AS roomCd /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.ROOM_OPTCD AS roomOptcd /* 객실 옵션코드, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.OPT_NM AS optNm /* 옵션 이름, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.OPT_AMT AS optAmt /* 옵션 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.LIMIT_QTY AS limitQty /* 최대 가능 수량, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT /* 직영/숙박 객실 옵션 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT_PK(P),SYS_C0011430(C) */ AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.ROOM_OPTCD = #{roomOptcd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 객실 옵션코드, VARCHAR2(100), EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT_PK(P),SYS_C0011431(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT /* 직영/숙박 객실 옵션 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.ROOM_OPTCD = #{roomOptcd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 객실 옵션코드, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.OPT_NM = #{optNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 옵션 이름, VARCHAR2(50) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.OPT_AMT = #{optAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 옵션 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.LIMIT_QTY = #{limitQty, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 최대 가능 수량, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.ROOM_CD AS roomCd /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.ROOM_OPTCD AS roomOptcd /* 객실 옵션코드, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.OPT_NM AS optNm /* 옵션 이름, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.OPT_AMT AS optAmt /* 옵션 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.LIMIT_QTY AS limitQty /* 최대 가능 수량, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT /* 직영/숙박 객실 옵션 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.ROOM_OPTCD = #{roomOptcd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 객실 옵션코드, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.OPT_NM = #{optNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 옵션 이름, VARCHAR2(50) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.OPT_AMT = #{optAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 옵션 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.LIMIT_QTY = #{limitQty, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 최대 가능 수량, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT.ROOM_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT SET /* 직영/숙박 객실 옵션 */ OPT_NM = #{optNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 옵션 이름, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,OPT_AMT = #{optAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 옵션 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,LIMIT_QTY = #{limitQty, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 최대 가능 수량, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND ROOM_OPTCD = #{roomOptcd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 객실 옵션코드, VARCHAR2(100) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_DIST_ROOM_OPT /* 직영/숙박 객실 옵션 */ WHERE 1=1 AND ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND ROOM_OPTCD = #{roomOptcd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 객실 옵션코드, VARCHAR2(100) */
